title: Request for endorsement

title: Review of the Nari Shakti Vandan Adhiniyam, the Women's Reservation Bill that was passed in 2023
text: This is to flag to the Government of India, and state governments, a reminder of commitments left unfulfilled, and recommend specific pathways to achieve the Beijing Declaration of Platform for Action.

title: National Alliance of Women's Organisations organized "Revisiting and Re-Envisioning Beijing"
text: Women from 3 generations- students, teachers, urban-rural-tribal working women, trade unionists, members of NGOs-CBOs-SHGs, faculty members of women's studies centres, think tanks, political activists and Feminist researchers, activists engaged in civil liberties concerns, journalists and members of national level women's organisations took active part in the deliberations
